column2: Brazil makes progress on saving forests
column4: Aug 18 Brazil has made good progress in safeguarding the Amazon rainforest but Indonesia's plans for its forests could face setbacks under a new government
column5: a report commissioned by top forest aid donor Norway said on Monday.

column2: $150 million convention center eyed for North Dakota oil patch WILLISTON
column3: Aug 18 A subsidiary of real estate developer The Prime Group Inc said on Monday it plans to build a $150 million convention center in Williston
column5: aiming to supply a world-class meeting space for the fast-growing oil boom community.

column2: ConvaTec owners eye 2015 sale as buyout interest builds-sources NEW YORK
column3: Aug 18 ConvaTec's private equity owners plan to explore a sale of the medical device maker next year
column4: even as interest from several healthcare companies in a potential $10 billion acquisition intensifies
column5: according to people familiar with the matter.
